title.narrative: Procurement Modernization Project

description.narrative: Indonesia - Procurement Modernization Project: This project includes activities to build a career path for procurement civil servants, create an institutionalized role and structure for procurement professionals that provides sufficient authority to implement good practice, and provide procurement professionals with new skills and tools to conduct procurements.

title.narrative: Indonesia STAR Report: Full Program Lifecycle Report
Modernizing Government Procurement in Indonesia
Procurement Modernization
Promoting Procurement Efficiency and Reform in Indonesia
Procurement Modernization Project Results
Date Procurement Management Information System (PMIS) launched

description.narrative: Date Output of Date by which all six PMIS module(s) have been launched nationally. PMIS modules will be rolled out in phases: (1) Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence (DWBI), (2) Pre-Catalogue, (3) Contract Management, (4) LPSE Cloud Hardware #1, (5) LPSE Cloud Hard

comment.narrative: Date by which all six PMIS module(s) have been launched nationally. PMIS modules will be rolled out in phases: (1) Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence (DWBI), (2) Pre-Catalogue, (3) Contract Management, (4) LPSE Cloud Hardware #1, (5) LPSE Cloud Hard Baseline
